Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Briefly \Brief"ly\ (br[=e]f"l[y^]), adv. Concisely; in few words. [1913 Webster]

briefly adv 1: for a short time; "she visited him briefly"; "was briefly associated with IBM" 2: in a concise manner; in a few words; "the history is summed up concisely in this book"; "she replied briefly"; "briefly, we have a problem"; "to put it shortly" [syn: {concisely}, {shortly}, {in brief}, {in short}]
